modShortDescription: Double the potency of the vanilla first aid bandage with a twist. The twist being your leg. Also counts as a splint.
modDescription:
Double the potency of the vanilla first aid [bandage](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-medical-supplies/) with a twist. The twist being your leg. Also counts as a splint.
